## Define OJS variables

```{webr}
#| define:
#|   - foo
#|   - bar
foo <- 123
bar <- rnorm(1)
```

```{ojs}
foo
bar
```

## Input OJS variables to code block

```{ojs}
baz = 123
```

```{webr}
#| input:
#|   - baz
baz
```




## Reactivity using OJS

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof m = Inputs.range([10, 1000], {step: 1})
```

```{webr}
#| input:
#|   - m
hist(rnorm(m))
```









---

Faster:

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof n = Inputs.range([10, 1000], {step: 1})
do_hist(n)
```


```{webr}
#| edit: false
#| echo: false
#| define:
#|   - do_hist
do_hist <- function(n) {
  hist(rnorm(n))
}
```
